thread.title: MediaZest expecting GBP1m in revenue from new projects
thread.title_full: MediaZest expecting GBP1m in revenue from new projects

title: MediaZest expecting GBP1m in revenue from new projects
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Tue, Oct 13, 2015, 18:40 BST - UK Markets closed MediaZest expecting GBP1m in revenue from new projects By Edward Swift | Sharecast – 8 hours ago 0.205 +0.040 
LONDON (ShareCast) - (ShareCast News) - MediaZest (LSE: MDZ.L - news ) said it's expecting £1m in revenue from some major projects with well-known brands. The AIM-listed audio-visual company released a trading statement on Tuesday ahead of the release of its half-year results next month. 
It (Other OTC: ITGL - news ) said the group had secured new business from Hyundai and Rockar with two significant new projects, and work continued with Adidas (Other OTC: ADDDF - news ) with projects for two additional UK stores and another in mainland Europe. 
It also gained a handful of new clients including Diesel, Molson Coors and the John Lewis Partnership. 
Revenue of £1m is expected to be delivered before the end of the calendar year, and MediaZest said it expects more projects down the line from the majority of the clients. 
The company's half year results to 30 September will be announced in November 2015.
